profileAlternative.name: Ognjen Kovac
profileAlternative.headline: Senior PHP and JavaScript Developer (Full Stack)
profileAlternative.summary:
Talented IT professional with rich technical skills and hands-on experience.

Capable of building lasting relationships with customers and partners. Proven ability to bring sustainable solutions to demanding situations.

Extremely organized and self motivated, able to multitask in high pressure, deadline-driven environments. Works independently and as a part of a team

positions.title: Developer, programmer

educations.title: Technical Faculty "Mihajlo Pupin" - Zrenjanin / University of Novi Sad

given.text:
For the past several years, I've had the pleasure of working with Ognjen Kovac on our company website, from initial launch, to redesigns, facelifts and ongoing updates to its functionality. Ognjen, is a professional and dedicated programmer, committed to getting the job done. He is attentive, polite, and is a very reliable colleague and team player. Ognjen is highly trustworthy and is eager to get the job done in the best manner possible. When discussing implementation considerations with him, it's always easy to get a clear handle on all pros and cons, and if and what else needs to be researched before deciding how to proceed. I'm very glad to recommend Ognjen, and I have no doubt that he will be a valuable asset to any organization choosing to avail themselves of his services.
…
See more

I head a great opportunity to work with Ognjen Kovac, he is a professional and dedicated programmer, committed to get the job done. He is attentive, polite, and is a highly reliable team player. We worked on numerous projects from custom CMS and CRM systems built from ground up. Ognjen is a quick learner and always ready to pass his knowledge to others. He is an excellent programmer and a colleague, it was pleasure working with him. I have no doubt that he will be a valuable asset to any organization. If you need someone who understands the technology and that self-improvement is a must in software development, Ognjen is your man.
…
See more

received.text: Ljubica Kazi was very inspiring mentor and teaching assistant. With great detail and care, she managed to transfer knowledge to students and point out potential problems and important steps regarding IT projects. I would like to recommend Ljubica for wide range of IT projects giving her expertise!

I worked with Vladimir on numerous CMS, CRM and general web application implementations as well as building our own CMS framework from scratch. He has handled his projects with precision and great enthusiasm. Vladimir has a unique ability to understand customer needs and deliver superior technical solutions to meet and exceed customer requirements in record time. It was fun working with Vladimir.
